items.sentence: Tom is sitting in his car, listening to the radio.

To make a long story short, we buried the hatchet.

Tom ate the cupcake that Mary was saving for John.
It never occurred to me that I might get punished.
It's been three years since Tom went to Australia.
I didn't have any trouble convincing Tom to leave.

Tom says that he wants to go to Australia with me.
